author: Ken Dilanian and Dan De Luce and Geoff Bennett
title: Trump admin's lack of a unified national coronavirus strategy will cost lives, say a dozen experts
description: The Trump administration's decision to let states chart their own responses to the coronavirus rather than impose a national strategy will cost many lives, say experts.
content: WASHINGTON The Trump administration's decision to let states chart their own responses to the coronavirus crisis rather than impose a national strategy will cost thousands of lives and is likely to result in an open-ended outbreak rolling across the country, … [+14127 chars]
